Class ZipTool

    • jjTool.ZipTool

extends java.lang.Object

      • putData

        public int putData(java.lang.String fName,
                   java.lang.String val,
                   java.lang.String charset,
                   long modT)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Put string data into zip file.
        Parameters:
        fName - (String) Compressed file name in zip.
        val - (String) Compressed data.
        charset - (String) Charset of compressed string.
        modT - (long/Date) Last modified time label in the zip file [optionally].
        Returns:
        (int) Added file numbers. Always return 1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Default exception event.

      • putData

        public int putData(java.lang.String fName,
                   byte[] val,
                   long modT)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Put binary data into zip file.
        Parameters:
        fName - (String) Compressed file name in zip.
        val - (byte[]) Compressed data.
        modT - (long/Date) Last modified time label in the zip file [optionally].
        Returns:
        (int) Added file numbers. Always return 1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Default exception event.
